name: MarbleFall
description:
Drag and drop the rows of platforms to move them. How long can you keep the marble from hitting the edges of the screen?

Made in 3 hours for Trijam #115.

Code, art, and SFX by Birdwards

Music: "Falling into You" by Little Glass Men, used under a CC-BY license.

Tools used:

  • Godot (game engine)
  • Inkscape (vector image editor)
  • GIMP (raster image editor)
  • bfxr (sound effects editor)
